language_equivalence_automaton.name: Language equivalence (to automaton)
language_equivalence_automaton.description: Checks if the automaton accepts exactly the same words (up until a given length) as the given automaton.

language_equivalence_words.name: Language equivalence (to word list)
language_equivalence_words.description: Checks if the automaton accepts exactly the given words (up until a given length).
